name: Bread of War
description:
Bread of War is a 2D arena action game made for the Butterscotch ShenaniJam 2018 inspired by Void Sandwich! Now with a fixed zip file!

Credits:

  • Programmer - Malcolm Gruber
  • Design - Altamush "Attish" Nayyer Khan
  • SFX/Music - Dan Forder, danforder.bandcamp.com
  • Concept/Art - Dageki
  • Art - Ivan, i7enin@gmail.com
